name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The blogger who compiled the yearbook of intern suicides received threats in private messages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 25, a news comment section in which a Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson accused the Taiwan authorities of using the island's hard-earned money to support a small number of powerful people was ridiculed by more than 20,000 netizens using emojis.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the night of March 25, at Changchun Health Vocational College, students who had been bullied by the student union protested that night.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Nearly two months after the suicide of a trainee student at Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, the media reported on the incident.
However, the relevant topics were filled with accusations of suicide by various bloggers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 26, a woman ran naked in Wuhan Hongshan Vanke Plaza

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 26, in front of the Chenzhou Municipal Government, owners of unfinished buildings protested to protect their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 26, a chain rear-end collision occurred on the Shandong Zibo Expressway due to heavy fog.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of March 25, in Qinhuangdao, Hebei Province, an Ideal car crashed into a guardrail and then collided with several cars parked on the roadside near Mingrixingcheng District 3, leaving a mess on the scene.
According to local netizens, the cause of the accident was suspected to be the driver's drunk driving. The driver fled after the accident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 25, a girl from Jinjiang Lingshui Middle School in Quanzhou, Fujian, jumped to her death after being bullied by her classmates for a long time. The child's parents went to the school to seek justice, but the school sent fully armed security guards to prohibit the parents from entering the office building.
Before jumping off the building, the girl sent a message to her mother to reveal that she was bullied by her classmates. The girl's mother said that her daughter was less than 13 years old and was usually very lively. There was more than one bully, and she was found to have transferred money to one bully many times.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 26, in Handan, Hebei, a netizen posted a video saying that he was blocked by several young men from the village on a road near Jiudian Village and was not allowed to pass through. They also snatched his mobile phone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 25, Mianyang, Sichuan. Due to a sharp rent increase by Fidelity, merchants in Majiaxiang Internet celebrity food street collectively closed their shops and went on strike, hanging banners at the door to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 25, Wendeng, Shandong. China Aerospace Shenyang Aircraft Industry Group workers defend their rights and demand wages with real names
The workers held up labor contracts and said that the company had owed employees wages for nearly eight years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The name is Shenyang, but the registered place is Wendeng, Shandong

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 26, Chongqing Huguang Beam Factory. Many workers did not have shifts after entering the factory, nor were they given typesetting. They were just allowed to rest every day. On that day, a large number of employees who were not assigned to work gathered at the factory to defend their rights. During the period, fierce conflicts broke out with the factory security guards. Some people fell to the ground during the conflict, and others were forcibly taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 26, residents of Muling, Mudanjiang, Heilongjiang Province, went to the Petition Bureau again regarding heating issues.
The day before, in order to get the crowd to leave, the government asked residents to fill out forms and wait for notifications, and the registration process lasted until 7pm. That night, someone spread the word that those who registered could go to the Petition Bureau the next day to apply for a refund, which led to a large number of people going to the Petition Bureau on the 26th, but no one was there to receive them.
Afterwards, the Petition Bureau continued to ask residents to register their house numbers and phone numbers on site.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 26, Xingtai, Hebei. Hongsheng Tangcheng Phase 3 has been unfinished for eight years and still has not been delivered. Owners jumped from the roof to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 3 a.m. on March 26, a new energy vehicle caught fire near Sancha Street in Jianyang, Chengdu, causing a temporary interruption of the optical cables of core telecommunications equipment and hundreds of base stations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up of Mo Yan's lawsuit
On March 25, Mao Xinghuo posted a message saying that the relevant departments replied that the public interest lawsuit filed by Mo Yan did not fall within the scope of cases accepted by the procuratorate.
The blogger once said that if the police complaint or report was not effective, the next step would be to march and demonstrate, and if that still did not work, then he would rise up in rebellion.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 25, the Nantong Civil Affairs Bureau and the Market Supervision Administration issued a notice stating that any unit or individual in the city is prohibited from making and selling paper money for the dead, or other feudal superstitious funeral practices. Violators will be fined up to three times the amount.
